column5: missed the DIRECT tie. Palamar will not work for a direct tie.
Too funny its called a unit knot two knots one at each end lol.Double uni knot is funny :rotflmao:
What knot do you guys use to tie super lines direct to florocarbon leaders? Specifically 10lb Fireline to 10 lb floro.
What knot do you guys use to tie super lines direct to florocarbon leaders? Specifically 10lb Fireline to 10 lb floro.
Use the uni Knot it works great
Use the uni Knot it works great
Yep - uni knot. Used it all year last year without any failures.
Yep - uni knot. Used it all year last year without any failures.
uni is also the knot I use. Easy to tie, strong hold!
Actually, you need to tie with a double-uni knot to keep the lines from slipping.
You are correct - double uni. LOL thinking about just tying a single uni on one of the lines. If you did that what ever bait/lure you had on would slip right off with your flouro leader - too funny!
Palamar. Won't slip and easy to tie. There isnt a better knot out there. Works for mono as well as any of the braided lines.
